title: The Bongles - Monster Takeaway
description: The Bongles series explores the world of the magical Bongle Planet with its colourful bouncy creatures and delivers a green environment message presented in an offbeat and fun way.In this story, a telephone phone box is pulled out from the sea by The Bongles. Brainy eventually works out what it is and dials for food delivery from a menu left in the phone box. A meal is promptly delivered by helicopter. A Sea Monster smelling the delicious food chases the Bongles and he steals the food. Eventually the phone box on the beach rings, The Twins answer - it’s the Sea Monster – and he lets out a burp.
author: Oscar Van Heek
